tool_description: Calculates and analyzes key financial ratios for underwriting assessment including liquidity, leverage, and coverage ratios.

liquid_assets.description: Total liquid assets (cash, savings, easily convertible investments)

total_assets.description: Total assets including real estate and investments

emergency_fund_months.description: Months of expenses covered by emergency fund

error_messages: Invalid financial values: All monetary amounts must be non-negative
Asset-liability inconsistency: Total assets should typically exceed total liabilities
Income-expense mismatch: Monthly expenses cannot exceed monthly income by more than 50%
Debt service error: Monthly debt payments cannot exceed monthly income
Liquid assets error: Liquid assets cannot exceed total assets
usage: Provide all required financial amounts for comprehensive ratio analysis. Optionally specify emergency_fund_months if known. Returns detailed financial ratio analysis and risk assessment.

debt_to_income_ratio.description: Monthly debt payments divided by monthly income

debt_to_assets_ratio.description: Total liabilities divided by total assets

liquidity_ratio.description: Liquid assets divided by monthly expenses

disposable_income.description: Monthly income minus expenses and debt payments
